output.sentences: They write welcome on the board when they visit a school.
Telling the school children welcome in Japanese and sign language is something he likes to do.
She usually teaches the children advanced sign language, but today she signs as she speaks in Japanese.
Following the lead of the other teachers he keeps to the simple stuff that he heard babbled when he first started school.
At the end of the lecture they decide to take a picture of the class.
